attributes.action: Parents of British Children living in the UK to have access to student loans.
attributes.additional_details:
If a parent is able to educate himself/herself and later get a proper job then that would be of great advantage to the child and the society in which he lives in. This will give the child a much more stable foundation in life especially for most parents who want the best for their children.

Government should immediately allow parents of British Children with Residence Permits but without Permanent Residence to be able to have access to student loans and Bursaries.

Thank you.
attributes.background: Foreign parents of British Children who now live in the UK are denied access to student loans and bursaries just because they do not have permanent residence. Parents of British Children should have access to student loans because that could be a way of supporting the child get a good start to life.
